By the 3erd day of thinning I figured I would have to call a plumber or see my hair dresser. After a good cry I chose the hair dresser. of my 12 weeks of taxol I could only do 6. I am 6 weeks done and my hair is coming back pretty fast. And about the same color it was. A nice salt and pepper and very soft.
